Content:
{
  "schemaVersion": "2.2",
  "description": "Command Document Example JSON Template",
  "parameters": {
    "IPAddress": {
      "type": "String",
      "description": "IP Address of the App server",
      "default": ""
    },
    "CustomerName": {
      "type": "String",
      "description": "QA or developer name",
      "default": ""
    },
    "ScID": {
      "type": "String",
      "description": "Service cluster ID of the deployment. Donot use.",
      "default": ""
    }
  },
  "mainSteps": [
    {
      "action": "aws:runPowerShellScript",
      "name": "example",
      "inputs": {
        "timeoutSeconds": "600",
        "runCommand": [
          "try {",
          "Set-Location C:\\SATools\\automation\\R20Scripts\\scripts",
          "$apigateway_name = \"DONOT-DELETE-DEV-API3\"",
          "$nlb_name = \"DONOT-DELETE-DEV-INT-NLB7\"",
          "$ip_addresses = \"{{IPAddress}}\"",
          "$sc_id = \"{{ScID}}\"",
          "$customer = \"{{CustomerName}}\"",
          "if ([String]::IsNullOrWhiteSpace($ip_addresses) -AND [String]::IsNullOrWhiteSpace($customer)) {",
          "Write-Error \"Mandatory parameters are missing\"",
          "exit 1",
          "}",
          "$deployment_command = \"python.exe ./dev_v3.py\"",
          "$deployment_command += ' \"$customer\"'",
          "$deployment_command += \" '$ip_addresses'\"",
          "$deployment_command += \" '$apigateway_name'\"",
          "$deployment_command += \" '$nlb_name'\"",
          "if (![String]::IsNullOrWhiteSpace($sc_id)) {",
          "$deployment_command += \" '$sc_id'\"",
          "}",
          "Invoke-Expression $deployment_command",
          "$deployment_exit_code = $LastExitCode",
          "if ($deployment_exit_code -eq 0) {",
          "Write-Output -Message \"Create deployment finished with exit code $deployment_exit_code\"",
          "exit 0",
          "}",
          "else {",
          "Write-Error \"Chef-client run failed. Exit code: $deployment_exit_code\"",
          "exit 1",
          "}",
          "}",
          "catch {",
          "Write-Error $_.Exception.Message",
          "exit 1",
          "}"
        ]
      }
    }
  ]
}
Name: arn:aws:ssm:us-west-2:958123553953:document/CreateDevDeployment
